BlackNighmare:


"EXCUSE ME HELLPLAGUE!!!"said annoyed BlackNightmare "This male IT'S 
MINE!!!! So get lost and find other maxi-fool to fight... 'cause 
UNICRON will be mad if he knows that you're kissing the ENEMIE!!!"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ ????:
>  
> Malice breifly reeled from the fist in the face, but recovered and 
back handed the minion.  He drew his sword and prepared to strike 
the final blow to Blacknightmare.  
>  
> Without warning, the sixth minion sprang into action.  She dived 
down on the bounty hunter and tackled him.  Both roll around on the 
ground until they are a fair distance away from the rest of the 
fighting.  They rested, with the sixth minion sitting on top of 
Malice, and both trying to force the other away.  She leaned down 
until their faces were only inches apart.
> "My, a powerful one.  And what is your name?" she asked in a 
seductive tone.
> "My name, is Malice, the single most powerful bounty hunter to 
walk any world," the transmetal male said as he continued pushing 
against his opponent,"and who are you?"
> "My name is Hellplague," she said, and stole a kiss before pushing 
herself off the hunter.  Said hunter stood and tried to wipe the 
action from his face.
> "You ought to keep your face to your self, lady, it will get you 
in trouble one of these days."
> Hellplague smirked and giggled to herself, thenm both charged 
forward and engaged in another stalemate.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> 
> blackNightmare  punched Malices face
>

> wrote:
> > Malice:
> >  
> > the missiles struck Malice head on and he falls back, and lands 
> near an energon deposit.  He struggles to his feet, and drives 
both 
> hands into the deposit.  The energy flows into him, speeding up 
his 
> healing proccess, and after a moment he is fully healed and is 
> draining the last of the energon for reserve.  He recovers his 
sword 
> and rushed up to Blacknightmare.  Sheathing his sword,he moves to 
> her side, puts her in a headlock, lifts her up, positions her over 
> his knee, and brings he down hard on the spike knee cap.  He drops 
> the femme, kicks her a few times, and prepares to finish her off.
